title: 如此轴心盟国？伊朗把天津大爆炸图像剪辑后称是袭击美国视频骗国内韭菜
contents:
via Twitter @unanacham

这个没看到首页转啊？绝了，伊朗电视台给人（jiǔ）民（cài）看的袭击美国军队的视频实际上是以色列和天津大爆炸的视频拼剪来的，真是深得老朋友真传惹！

Iranian state TV published a video from #IRGC attack to US troops in Iraq, But videos are fake.
The first explosion in the video is a rocket attacks to Israel 2018 (https://t.co/WHt8dPVved) and second a massive explosions in China 2015. (https://t.co/rPCPfIK4Ya)
Source @s7az2mm 

https://t.co/43WGck1jLE
